content:
I am getting the following error when running isabelle components -u afp-2022/thys
"Bad component catalog file: "/home/julian/Isabelle/Isabelle2022/Admin/components/main""
Does anyone know what that's about?
It sounds like your user settings file is broken - does Isabelle itself (without AFP) work?

So i removed the ~/.isabelle folder and then it works. It seems to be quite consistent that I get this error whenever I run isabelle components -I, after that I always need to rm ~/.isabelle for everything to work again
You shouldn't need to generate any settings file in the release version. You can add the AFP component without, as described in the AFP help page.
